class.description: A range-sensor (sonar, IR) based obstacle layer for costmap_2d
Same as RangeSensorLayer but can also subscribe to other layers for updates.
Same as ExtendedRangeSensorLayer but for gopher_std_msgs::Ranges (aka an array of sensor_msgs::Range).
Same as range_sensor_layer::RangeArrayLayer but for gopher_std_msgs::Bumpers (aka an array of bumper msgs).
